full_summary:
**Télémetry Laser Imageur Thermique Portatif de Longue Portée**
**Request for Information (RFI)**

**Reference Number and Solicitation Number**

PW-__QD-030-29031
W8476-226536/A

**Publication and Closing Dates**

* Publication Date: April 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 8, 2023, at 13:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Trade Agreement and Procurement Method**

* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Requirements and Specifications**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a Laser Range Finder Hand Held Thermal Imager Long Range (LRF HHTI-LR). This request for information (RFI) is a preliminary phase of the procurement process.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

The documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries, please contact:
Xiao, Tanya
Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada (TPSGB)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Québec K1A 0S5
(873) 355-1225 (phone)
(tanya.xiao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, email)

**Attachments**

The following documents are attached:

* Phase 1 documents (documents de la phase 1)
* Phase 2 documents (documents de la phase 2)
* Amendment 2 (modification 2)
* Other relevant documents (autres documents pertinents)

The attachments can be downloaded from the Canada BuyConnect website. [1]

**Notes**

The Department of National Defence may request the submission of a bid if the industry interest in this request is adequate. Suppliers interested in responding to this RFI can highlight their capabilities and indicate their intent to submit a bid.

Note for journalist or media researcher translation for contacts listed above will not facilitated'].'</font>
